programme.title: This Thriving Land Ep36
programme.desc: Portraying the rise and fall of the Ning, Feng & Fei families across two generations, as well as their entwined fates and enduring bonds forged by their struggle & love for the same land they call home.

programme.title: The Legend Of Yang Jian
programme.desc: Yang Jian descends Kunlun mountain to retrieve Pangu's axe, battling Shen Gong Bao with assistance from Xiao Tian, Feng Ling'er, Feng You Wei and others.

programme.title: Shadow Love Ep33
programme.desc: General Li Shuang of Tai Jin rescues an amnesiac man, Jin An. As they grow close, romance blooms. But Jin An's true identity as a prince of an enemy kingdom forces them into conflict.

programme.title: Shadow Love Ep34
programme.desc: General Li Shuang of Tai Jin rescues an amnesiac man, Jin An. As they grow close, romance blooms. But Jin An's true identity as a prince of an enemy kingdom forces them into conflict.

programme.title: A Forbidden Marriage Ep20
programme.desc: Demon Sect's saintess Wang Yue is reborn after a near-death experience, becoming a humble orphan while holding onto her unfinished wish—to be with the righteous elder Yang Qing.

programme.title: A Forbidden Marriage Ep21
programme.desc: Demon Sect's saintess Wang Yue is reborn after a near-death experience, becoming a humble orphan while holding onto her unfinished wish—to be with the righteous elder Yang Qing.

programme.title: Wind Direction Ep08
programme.desc: The story of the Cheng family, who moved from the northwest to the coastal base of Heping Town, where three generations of their family works in the oilfield.

programme.title: Infernal Storm
programme.desc: After a botched drug raid, an undercover police officer is exposed & hunted by members of the biggest drug trafficking organisation in Hong Kong. He must now survive & bring the crime boss to justice.

programme.title: Xu Fu Treasure
programme.desc: Based on the historical & folklore tale of Xu Fu's journey to the East, the story tells of Chen Qi Long, who strives to protect the country's treasures from falling into the hands of the enemy.

programme.title: Fortune Teller
programme.desc: Zhao Da Chun is a well-known local psychic who privately joined forces with his younger brother to help fortune tellers solve practical problems, leading to many amusing situations.

programme.title: HAHAHAHAHA S5 Ep10
programme.desc: Led by Deng Chao, Chen He, Fan Zhi Yi, and Wang Mian, the "Five Ha" team travels through Xinjiang, Hainan, and Sichuan, blending comedy with local culture to showcase China's diverse folk traditions.

programme.title: Special Monster
programme.desc: Gao Cheng set sail in search of an ancient ship carrying countless treasures that mysteriously vanished, only to end up on a mysterious island inhabited by a primitive tribe & alien creatures.

programme.title: White Cat Legend Ep31
programme.desc: Starring Ding Yu Xi, Zhou Qi, Wei Zhe Ming and more. Li Bing, favored by the empress, becomes Deputy Chief. With allies, they defy fate and uphold justice in the divine capital.

programme.desc: Starring Ding Yu Xi, Zhou Qi, Wei Zhe Ming and more. Li Bing, favored by the empress, becomes Deputy Chief. With allies, they defy fate and uphold justice in the divine capital.

programme.title: Nvxia Fan Lihua
programme.desc: Fan Li Hua fell in love with Xue Ding Shan at first sight, but he only wants her to return to the battlefield to eliminate bandits. It is only through hardships that the two begin to understand each other.

programme.title: Blocking The Horse
programme.desc: Ten years later after the death of General Yang Ye, Yang Ba Jie & Yang Jiu Mei are determined to regain their father's lost treasured blade & restore the glory of the Great Song Empire.

programme.title: HAHAHAHAHA S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Led by Deng Chao, Chen He, Fan Zhi Yi, and Wang Mian, the "Five Ha" team travels through Xinjiang, Hainan, and Sichuan, blending comedy with local culture to showcase China's diverse folk traditions.

programme.title: The God Lei Zhenzi
programme.desc: During the Yin Dynasty, King Zhou ruled with tyranny, captivated by the fox spirit Su Daji. Ji Chang's righteous adopted son, Lei Zhenzi engaged in a fierce battle with Su Daji to unravel her schemes.

programme.title: Mi Wu Ci Sha
programme.desc: The daughter of a late great general embarks on a journey for revenge when she discovers that the mastermind to the murder of her biological father is her foster father, the Prime Minister.

programme.title: The Strange Beast Of Silent Island
programme.desc: Married couple Ye Bo Ming and Yi Lin are engaged in aquaculture on a remote island. During her cousin's visit, a strange bloodthirsty beast trapped in a mine is accidentally released.

programme.title: The Drunken Prodigy
programme.desc: A spoiled young man with a passion for martial arts loses his entire fortune when he falls victim to a series of traps set by malicious gang while pursuing the top courtesan.

programme.title: Nine Colors Deer King
programme.desc: A strange disease has spread across Huanyi Village, prompting the guardian of the mountain Chang Sheng to find the legendary Nine-color Deer King to save the village.

programme.desc: The story of the Cheng family, who moved from the northwest to the coastal base of Heping Town, where three generations of their family works in the oilfield.

programme.title: Rhapsody In Bathhouse
programme.desc: Waking up from a coma, a man unexpectedly finds himself back in the 1990s. He meets his young father, whom he'd always been ashamed of, but gradually begins to gain deeper understanding & insight.

programme.title: The Chi Dragon Slash
programme.desc: At the end of the Tang Dynasty, Navy General Qian Liu set off to exterminate the river pirates, only to discover a mystical two-headed beast called the Chi dragon in a cave.

programme.title: Ghost Mantis 2 Mutation
programme.desc: Entomologist Su Hao is kidnapped & forced to participate in splicing experiments. To halt the inhumane experiments, Su Hao fights in a life-and-death battle against the demonic leader.

programme.title: Blade Of Fury
programme.desc: Pei Xing is famous for being an 'unkillable' & cold-blooded assassin. But after witnessing great injustice, his dormant chivalry gradually awakens and he decides to retaliate in kind.

programme.title: Guardian Of Graveyard

programme.title: The Legend Of Man And Loong
programme.desc: The Huan Long family has lived with & fought alongside dragons since ancient times. However, after a betrayal, all the dragon kings were sealed into the Nine Dragon Wall.
